statements: SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, email, payment_method FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT registration_date FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT username FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_methods WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT payment_id, method FROM payment_methods WHERE method LIKE 'Credit%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email NOT LIKE '%hotmail.com';
SELECT u.username, p.method FROM users u JOIN payment_methods p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE p.method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT DISTINCT u.username, p.method FROM users u JOIN payment_methods p ON u.user_id = p.user_id ORDER BY u.username ASC, p.method DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM payment_methods WHERE payment_type = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY card_number DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM payment_methods WHERE payment_type = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY expiry_date ASC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, u.username, pm.payment_type FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id JOIN payment_methods pm ON pm.payment_id = t.payment_id WHERE t.amount > 1000;
SELECT u.username, pm.card_number FROM payment_methods pm JOIN users u ON u.user_id = pm.user_id WHERE pm.expiry_date < '2023-05-01';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT payment_id, user_id, payment_method FROM payments WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards WHERE user_id = 2;

SELECT username FROM users WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'alice_smith';
SELECT user_id, payment_method FROM payments JOIN users ON payments.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT username, card_number FROM users JOIN credit_cards ON users.user_id = credit_cards.user_id WHERE card_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT user_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM user_payments GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT payment_amount, method_name FROM user_payments JOIN payment_methods ON user_payments.method_id = payment_methods.method_id;
SELECT username, city, state FROM users JOIN addresses ON users.user_id = addresses.user_id WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT user_id, address_line, city, state, zipcode FROM users JOIN addresses ON users.user_id = addresses.user_id WHERE zipcode LIKE '9%';
